file.title: Id registry program

p.text: ID in the registry indicates where in the registry to locate a record of the trial period of your program. All registration keys are issued for a specific ID program . If you change it, then the previously issued keys (on the old ID) is not suitable for a new ID. Also, the same shall remain encryption key .

p.textAll: If you use two objects Trial - for example, one to enter the activation key, the other for the generation of these keys (as in the example Examples \ Complex projects \ Trial ), then make sure that the program Id and encryption key they were same !
